Takes the official Reddit app push notifications and turns them into Apollo ones.

There are no settings but you must do the following things to get it to work
• Install this app
• Install the official reddit app and sign in
• Have Apollo installed and open it at least once after installing this package to allow notification permissions
• Go to the Settings app -> Reddit -> Notifications and make sure your settings look like the screenshot further below..

Now you should be good to go. As far as i know Apollo doesn't support opening intents so clicking on the notification will always just open the app, It will not take you to a specific post or message for now.

This tweak is also open source
